summary: The module provides a Litellm-compatible chat interface for IBM WatsonX. It translates OpenAI‑style chat requests into WatsonX's text‑chat format, constructs and sends HTTP calls, handles both standard and streaming responses, and maps generic parameters and tool‑choice settings to WatsonX‑specific equivalents.
business_intent: Allow applications built on Litellm to leverage IBM WatsonX for conversational AI without changing their existing OpenAI‑based code, simplifying integration and expanding deployment options.
